name: Peggle™ Nights
description: The sun has set at the Peggle Institute, but the bouncy delight has just begun! Join the Peggle Masters on a dreamtime adventure of alter egos and peg-tastic action. Stay up late to aim, shoot and clear orange pegs, and bask in Extreme Fever glory under the silver moon. Then, put your Peggle skills to the ultimate test in Challenge mode.

This is a great little game if you have a few minutes to kill, lots of different special abilities and some cool levels. I'm not usually into the casual games, but this one is entertaining.

For those who have never played Peggle, you use a launcher at the top of the screen to launch balls into the field and knock out all the orange pegs within 10 shots (though you have chances for free balls).   It would be more accurate to call this Peggle Dreams (Nights Into Dreams?), as you look into the dreams of various creatures, like how Shining Armor wants to be a superhero, a Totally Radical hamster wants to be a scientist, and a dragon wants to fight fires instead of starting them. It's on the short side, but it's not without its challenges or fun.
